resources.string: Campus 411 is a one-stop service center that can assist you with any questions regarding your admission, academic record, financial aid, registration, and your student account.

Our mission is to provide a centralized location where the University community is effectively and efficiently served, resolve issues in support of educational goals, and empower students to manage their academic life.
The lyrics to the "The Pride of Cleveland" and a play/pause button for the fight song to be played.
Page of text with links to all of their social network accounts.
The Call Center is your first stop for troubleshooting or to answer computer related questions. Call us with your questions to request service!
If you have an issue with a computer - either hardware or software - call the Call Center. If we can\'t help you immediately, we will have someone contact you.
Casual computing in a relaxed environment. Your technology fees at work! Two locations to serve you better.

Hours: 
Monday - Thursday: 7:30 AM to 10:00 PM 
Friday & Saturday: 7:30 AM to 5:00 PM 
Sunday: Closed
